title: WoFi calling option disapeared.
content:
Hi, I'm from Israel and using Pelephone services. 
For some reason I can't even see the option of WiFi-Calling on my pixel. 
I've contacted Pelephone and they told me that everything is enabled on their side and should be working for me. 
The problem is that I can't even see the option of WiFi-Calling. I've searched everywhere.
